trans-unit.source: Install ATA - Step 3 | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: Install ATA - Step 3 | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Step three of installing ATA helps you download the ATA Gateway setup package.
trans-unit.target: Step three of installing ATA helps you download the ATA Gateway setup package.

trans-unit.source: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7

trans-unit.source: Install ATA - Step 3
trans-unit.target: Install ATA - Step 3

trans-unit.source: [« Step 2](install-ata-step2.md) [Step 4 »](install-ata-step4.md)
trans-unit.target: [« Step 2](install-ata-step2.md) [Step 4 »](install-ata-step4.md)

trans-unit.source: Step 3.
trans-unit.target: Step 3.

trans-unit.source: Download the ATA Gateway setup package
trans-unit.target: Download the ATA Gateway setup package

trans-unit.source: After configuring the domain connectivity settings you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.
trans-unit.target: After configuring the domain connectivity settings you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway can be installed on a dedicated server or on a domain controller.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway can be installed on a dedicated server or on a domain controller.

trans-unit.source: If you install it on a domain controller, it will be installed as an ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: If you install it on a domain controller, it will be installed as an ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the ATA Lightweight Gateway, see [ATA Architecture](/advanced-threat-analytics/plan-design/ata-architecture).
trans-unit.target: For more information on the ATA Lightweight Gateway, see [ATA Architecture](/advanced-threat-analytics/plan-design/ata-architecture).

trans-unit.source: If this is the first time you are downloading an ATA Gateway, you will get the following screen:
trans-unit.target: If this is the first time you are downloading an ATA Gateway, you will get the following screen:

trans-unit.source: ATA gateway configuration settings
trans-unit.target: ATA gateway configuration settings

trans-unit.source: If this is not your first time downloading an ATA Gateway, this welcome message will not appear.
trans-unit.target: If this is not your first time downloading an ATA Gateway, this welcome message will not appear.

trans-unit.source: To reach the configuration screen later, click the **settings icon** (upper right corner) and select **Configuration**, then, under **System**, click **Gateways**.
trans-unit.target: To reach the configuration screen later, click the **settings icon** (upper right corner) and select **Configuration**, then, under **System**, click **Gateways**.

trans-unit.source: Click **"Download Gateway Setup"**.
trans-unit.target: Click **"Download Gateway Setup"**.

trans-unit.source: Save the package locally.
trans-unit.target: Save the package locally.

trans-unit.source: Copy the package to the dedicated server or domain controller onto which you are installing the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Copy the package to the dedicated server or domain controller onto which you are installing the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can open the ATA Console from the dedicated server or domain controller and skip this step.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can open the ATA Console from the dedicated server or domain controller and skip this step.

trans-unit.source: The zip file includes the following:
trans-unit.target: The zip file includes the following:

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway installer
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway installer

trans-unit.source: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center
